original_text: People were also bringing babies to Jesus for him to place his hands on them. When the disciples saw this, they rebuked them.
korean_text: 사람들이 예수께서 만져 주심을 바라고 자기 어린 아기를 데리고 오매 제자들이 보고 꾸짖거늘

sentences.original_text: People were also bringing babies to Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 또한 아기들을 예수님께 데려오고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: for him to place his hands on them
